install.name: System - Thinki15 Google Analytics
install.author: Noxidsoft - Noel M Dixon
install.description: This Plugin puts the New Asynchronous Tracking Code from Google Analytics into your site.

param.name: web_property_id
param.label: Web Property ID
param.description: This is the Web Property ID provided by Google. The format is: UA-XXXXXXX-X
